medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented with sudden epigastric pain at 9:30 PM last night after dinner. He describes the pain as sharp and constant, without radiation, and experienced abdominal pressure followed by induced vomiting. He reports previous episodes of less severe pain that self-resolved in about 45 minutes over the last few months.
medical_history.family_history: Grandmother and uncle with heart disease.
